  • Method Details

    • getCaloriesPerGram

      public double getCaloriesPerGram(String foodName) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the calorie content per gram for a specified food item.
      Parameters:
      foodName - The name of the food item.
      Returns:
      The calories per gram for the food item.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • getNutrientBreakdown

      public Map<String,Double> getNutrientBreakdown(String foodName) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the nutrient breakdown (e.g., protein, carbs, fat) for a specified food item. The breakdown is returned as a Map where keys are nutrient names (String) and values are their respective quantities (Double).
      Parameters:
      foodName - The name of the food item.
      Returns:
      A Map containing the nutrient breakdown for the food item. Returns an empty map or a map with default values if the food or nutrient data is not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
